categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Better Than Nothing is a short story appearing in the June 1996 Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook, written by Peter M. Schweighofer for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The story centers around smuggler Platt Okeefe and her unsophisticated ASP-7 labor droid, SeeVee.

Platt Okeefe, having previously being forced by an Imperial picket to ditch her ship in the Dorajan jungle, attempts to enlist the assistance of SeeVee. The droid is unhelpful in delivering a hydrospanner, much to Okeefe's annoyance.
